channel.title: How do you record/upload recorded sounds?
channel.description: So I know that with the new update you can record sounds, but how? Cause I have some great ideas but don’t know how to upload. Can anyone help?

item.title: How do you record/upload recorded sounds?
item.dc:creator: Dj_Peloton
item.source: How do you record/upload recorded sounds?

item.title: How do you record/upload recorded sounds?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
You can’t record sounds, but you can import WAV files…

http://auxy.co/importfaq.html

You’ll need to record them another way.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you record/upload recorded sounds?
